Title: The Book of Nora
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Tom Perrotta (teleplay by), Damon Lindelof (teleplay by), Tom Spezialy (story by), Damon Lindelof (story by), Lila Byock (story editor), Tamara P. Carter (story editor), Nick Cuse (story editor)
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka
Plot: Nora wishes to step into Dr. Eden and Dr. Bekker's machine. But, what are the consequences?
